title: Bioshock.Infinite.Complete.Edition.Steam.Rip-Origins

Description:
1912.
United States achieved world domination, and the floating city of Columbia, opened with great fanfare by the enthusiastic audience jubilation, became majestic symbol of American ideals.
However, a promising venture soon turned into a disaster: for some unknown reason, the city suddenly disappeared in the sky-high given.
America's greatest achievement has disappeared without a trace ...

In this story full of mysteries main role for the former detective agency Pinkerton Booker DeWitt.
He was sent to Colombia with the aim to find and release some of Elizabeth, for which the city of the future has become a flying prison in childhood.
Detective will establish a relationship with the girl, to the full extent of its use and its unusual ability - because out of Columbia, which loses altitude every second (and therefore its collapse - a matter of time), they get only a couple.

Supplement "Clash in the Clouds" is focused on the combat component of BioShock Infinite.
Combine weapons, energy, gears, breaks and aerotrassy most unimaginable ways and get out of the most difficult situations.
You will test 60 4 brand new maps.
Take the test "Blue Ribbon" and open sketches golosofony, kinetoscopes etc. Columbia Archaeological Society.

In addition "Burial at Sea - Episode 1" you along with Booker and Elizabeth return to Rapture shortly before the fall of the underwater city.
You will see the Rapture, which is not seen it before.
This diamond shining on the ocean floor has been re-created from scratch for the engine BioShock Infinite.
Rebalanced and redesigned game system fights emphasis on resource management and secrecy that allowed to combine the best of BioShock and BioShock Infinite.
New weapons, the old favorite weapons of the original BioShock, the return wheel arms, the new plasmids, new gear and breaks.

In "Burial at Sea - Episode 2" you can see the world through the eyes of Elizabeth.
The final part, talking about events after the addition of "" Burial at sea - Episode 1 "," gives you the role of Elizabeth, who wanders through Rapture, trying to rescue the abandoned little sister.
Studio Irrational Games, BioShock has created and BioShock Infinite, develops saga "" Burial at Sea "," featuring previously hidden parts of Rapture.
Explore the city and take part in the plot, which involves almost all the key characters of BioShock and BioShock Infinite.
Style games focused on masking, you'll gain new weapons and plasmids, retaining some of the old favorite.
BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode 2 is the last of three additions to BioShock Infinite and closes the main storyline of the game and "Burial at sea".
Features:
"Immerse yourself in the enchanting atmosphere of bright original world in the style of American industrialism, embodied on the Unreal Engine 3. 
"Solving puzzles disclosure sinister secrets and the struggle for life in a dizzying battles under the clouds - not stay in Colombia is neither boring nor monotonous 
"Use at its discretion, a lot of weapons and abilities rather trivial characters. 
"In the celestial world hostile Elizabeth become your faithful companion. And let her actions run the game for you, it is sure to become a real, live person. 
"Love the ordeal? So, you just addressed mode increased realism - "1999." Accept the challenge to developers - and you have to carefully weigh the "pros" and "cons" before making any decision. How should I think over the line of the hero - remember that the possibility of his resurrection and limited any misstep could lead to the sudden termination of the game.
